Add-on repositories, or repos, are components built for a specific product or
experience. The repos are built on top of the core Carbon repo, and enable
IBMers believe in progress—that application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition.
What we borrow from our own design history is not a mid-century aesthetic in stylistic terms, but the modernist attitudes and approach used at the time.

This is a demonstration of an ordered list item. This list item is particularly long to demonstrate how the text wraps and aligns with the first line.
This is a nested list item, it should wrap in the same way. Typically, nested list items should be of the same type (ordered, unordered) as their parent.
This is a demonstration of an unordered list item. This list item is particularly long to demonstrate how the text wraps and aligns with the first line.
This is a nested list item, it should wrap in the same way. Typically, nested list items should be of the same type (ordered, unordered) as their parent.
